author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve installation tips…I use MegaTape and pipe thread sealant. This ensures a watertight seal. I also center the valve on the shower drain. Then I crimp all my fittings and check them with a Go/No-Go Gauge. This full tutorial is available inside our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#plumbing #showerremodel #bathroominspiration #homerestoration
title: Shower Valve Installation Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #plumbing
